title: [FEATURE] Expose SKPath.Equals(SKPath)
body:
**Is your feature request related to a problem? Please describe.**

Skia has an `equals(otherPath)` method that would be good to expose: https://skia.org/docs/user/modules/pathkit/#equalsotherpath

**Describe the solution you'd like**

A method similar to `SKPath.Equals(SKPath otherPath)`

**Describe alternatives you've considered**

Iterating over the paths in C# and looking for differences, but that would be considerably slower.
